attributes.action: Tax any employee of any bank or financial institution, that has required government assistance, on earnings above £250,000 at a rate of 99%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tax any employee of any bank or financial institution, that has required government assistance, on earnings or bonuses above £250,000 per annnum at a rate of 99%.(To be levied whilst state aid/guarantees given to the bank)
Legislation should also be enacted whereby any future failure of a bank, where it requires state aid or becomes insolvent, allows executives of the bank to be liable to criminal charges.
Legislation to allow for the prosecution of auditing firms who clear the accounts of banks which subsequently require state aid or go into insolvency.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
